dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I care not for words, but if you wish to speak, go on, weakling.

playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! A brave one, are you? Let us see if your courage matches your foolishness.
You shall regret facing the might of Gorash!
A futile attempt! Feel the wrath of a true beast!
Reason?! Weakling, there is no reasoning with a Lindwurm!
Running like a coward, are we? Pathetic.
Too late for regrets! Tremble before my power!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Try to find a peaceful resolution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful resolution?! Ha! Prepare for your end, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Attempt to engage in dialogue with Gorash.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Speak, then. But make it swift, or face the consequences.
I am no tale-teller. My origins matter not to the likes of you.
Intentions? To crush all who oppose me, including you.
Cooperation? With you? Such a notion is laughable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Remain silent and observe Gorash's reaction.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Silence... An interesting choice. Perhaps you are not completely useless after all.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Break the silence and challenge Gorash.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So, you do possess some semblance of courage. Let us test it in battle!
Very well. I shall ignore your presence, insignificant one.
